description:
I tried several mail apps and I really loved this one. I loved the look and feel, the easy interface and powerful at the same time, very useful options in
 the mail list, etc.
the only problem that makes me stop using the app is that recently whenever I want to attach a file to an email, the app quits
summary: lovely but a vital bug recently

description:
You can use it with more than one email account.
Works with IMAP and POP3.
Small gripe.
When sending email, won’t let you use upper case letters in the email address.
Sometimes I like to display emails sent as FirstnameLastname@domain.com and not firstnamelastname@domain.com
summary: You can use it with more than one account

description: Missing calendar + preview
Only works with IMAP and POP3. It's unfortunate since I wanted to add my ProtonMail account.

I just download the app and will update the review if something changes or if i'm unhappy for some reasons. If it isn't updated, it means i'm still using it and that i'm more than happy with it. 

Pro 
- Extremely fast connexion to many providers (exchange, gmail, outlook/hotmail, and more)
- No difficulty setting up emails. Fast and simple. 
- Automatically synchronize emails at start
- Night mod
- Pure design with many fast buttons and intuitive thinking

Cons
- Design wize, the is a flaw that makes it difficult to read :
	The left vertical bar is setup with small icons of the compagny type (gmail icon, outlook icon...). Under it, there is the "name" you set for that email. And there is a little icon with the number of unread emails. The "unread" icon is too small, which make it difficult to read. And because the icons are not taking the entire space between the border of the app and the border of the email functionnalities (new mail, inbox, drafts, sent...), it is less readable overall. It would be more pure and clean if those icons took the entire space. And it would add more space for the "unread" icons. 

Overall, a wonderfull app. Good functionnalities, lots of emails setup possibilities (got 4 emails adress and no problems), a good design overall (besides what i wrote before) with intuitie icons. Well done

When I try to run it, nothing happens. At the commad line, it doesn't even output an error. There is no process left running either. It acts like a NOOP application as far as I can tell. Running Ubuntu 20.10.
I have tested many email apps for Zorin Ultimate linux and the is by far the best email service so far. It is easy to add email accounts and is easy to navigate.
summary: So Far the best for LInux

description:
I am new to Ubuntu and this app was a lifesaver. I couldn't set up my office 365 mail with some other email clients i tried. No matter what I tried the outgoing server settings could not work. The process of finding email clients, installing them, setting them up and removing them ended when I came across this app. It immediately connected with both office 365 email accounts with 0 tweaking from my side. 

Yes, the design could be better, I would appreciate email preview window and the option to change the size of the left side bar, but hey, it works nicely and has everything I need.
summary: About the only app that works for me

description: Works really well with Office 365 products and works flawlessly. Pretty nice given all the issues I've had with other clients. I'll be using this for the forseeable future. No calendar support though.
It definitelty works! Needs default mail app feature for Ubuntu and hopefully calendar sync soon. Works with Exchange, Gmail, Yahoo!, and many others with no issue.

Authorization Error
Error 401: disabled_client
Sign in with Google temporarily disabled for this app. This app has not been verified yet by Google in order to use Google Sign In.

I would like to write a review but i did not get past the first screen. The app currently has issues with google since it appears to be blocked from accessing gmail.
When this is fixed i would like to write another review, ´till then one star
summary: Issue with google, app is disabled

description: I like the look of this however without a UK English spell cheker it's no use to me. Shame
The developer should update the app to sign into google because it is still unverified. Unusable with gmail

I have 4 email accounts that I commonly use:

1 Apple
2 GMail
1 Protonmail

As of April 2022, TypeApp would connect only to the Apple account. Any attempt to connect to either GMail account was refused by Google with an error saying that TypeApp needs to be "verified" by Google to be allowed access to GMail accounts.

The Protonmail bridge uses non-standard SMTP and IMAP ports. I was able to connect to the IMAP side, but was unable to enter a custom port number when connecting to the SMTP server.

The UI looked nice (1 star) and it got 1 out of 4 accounts (another star). Maybe they'll get it fixed and I'll try again.
summary: Won't connect to GMail or Protonmail bridge

description: The best looking client, yet has all the features you need for a standard user like aliases, and even different display names for different aliases.
It breaks my Ubuntu 22.04 every time i have used it, i like the interface but its soo bugged
saddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddđ

Ubuntu seriousely needs a paid email client for business purpose. I whole heartedly support the initiative, but it can't be at te expenses of me struggling with emails. Issues Noticed after setting up a ActiveSync Account.

 - Tried to open folder management. Total white screen. had to force close the app.
 - Tried to read through synced emails. All emails were displayed with [enter] marks. The full content was a total unreadable soup.
works for hotmail (crapiest email provider ever, not recommended) and gmail
its an email program. why so many permissions needed to access office365?
summary: too many permissions needed for outlook.com

description: Die Auflistung ist sehr unübersichtlich bzw. unschön. Das hin und her springen zwischen den eMails und Posteingang ist sehr störend.
yo uso esta aplicacion en android tambien y me va perfectamente
Works on ubuntu 18.04

Actualiza muy rápido los correo, cosa que no hace ninguna otra app en linux, e incluso ninguna app de Android lo hace tan rápido. Me gusta su simplicidad, y el diseño es perfecto y agradable. Apenas tenga una oprtunidad donaré un poco. Lo merecen y los felicito por su trabajo.
summary: Es perfecta, trabaja muy bien y fluido

description: Es una de las mejores apps que he encontrado para gestionar mi correo, sencillo, con todas las características esenciales, sin complicaciones al añadir las cuentas, esteticamente hermoso, y lo mejor: Tema oscuro dentro de las misma app, que para mi es esecial.
summary: El mejor gestor de correo de Linux

description: No encontre otra aplicación de correo tan simple, práctica y bien diseñada.LS
Permite conexion via IMAP
Es buena, la recomiendo.
yo use esta aplicacion y resulto buena, pero despues que cerre accidentalmente la cuenta no pude volver a ingresar a ella y solo puedo ingresar atravez de android

Esta Aplicación es igual a Blue Mail y Blix Mail, en su versión de escritorio funciona bien mientras no se queda pegada, visualmente esta bien, pero por ejemplo no puedes ver los contactos estos no se sincronizan de buena forma, no acepta Google Work. así que hay que configurar manual vía imap o pop.
Il m'est impossible d'imprimer autre qu'en pdf. L'imprimante n'apparait pas et ne trouve l'option d'ajout d'imprimante. Un calvaire pour imprimer des mais importants!
Поработайте пожалуйста над оптимизацией приложения.
summary: Интерфейс приложения куда лучше и удобнее аналогов. Но долгий запуск

description: Не подскажите, как подключить Гугл почту? (выдает ошибку) А так в целом - прекрасное приложение.
gmail не подключает. пишет ошибку, но на почту пришло уведомление о том, что почта подключен на linuxю Возможно приложение сделано для кражи данных??
Ubuntu 22.04 Программа установилась, но не запустилась
